<h1 align="center">
  Kiut Note
</h1>

This project is a created with [Create React App](https://github.com/facebook/create-react-app).

This project of a _task note_ it is a personal project to practice React Hooks. I created this project of 0. I made its React.js structure and CSS styles. I decided on the design of the page based on the *kawaii culture*.

## Available Scripts

In the project directory, you can run:


### `npm install`

Remember use *npm install* for download folder node_modules.<br>

### `npm start`

Runs the app in the development mode.<br>
Open [http://localhost:3000](http://localhost:3000) to view it in the browser.

The page will reload if you make edits.<br>
You will also see any lint errors in the console.
